chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 hopped to Beatrice the chick’s 🐥 bedside. "Ribbit! Medicine time, Beatrice! 10 PM sharp!" Beatrice chirped, taking her drops. One night, playing hopscotch, Beatrice forgot! 😱 Ferdinand found her, tiny wings aflutter with panic. "Croak! You'll catch the dreaded Feather Flu!" He dramatically fainted. 🤣 Beatrice giggled, took her medicine, and promised Ferdinand extra flies for his trouble. 🪰
